Phones That Are Not Compatible
Monster Rancher Metropolis: My Monster Rancher Archive (Andriod): FAQ: The Most Important Game Info: Phones That Are Not Compatible
By Lisa Shock on Tuesday, January 3, 2012 - 01:20 pm:

Here's a a list of phones we know don't work with My Monster Rancher. This list is not complete. Please feel free to submit phone models in the Cafe thread on this topic.

LG Ally
LG Optmius
LG Optimus S
LG Optimus V
Motorola Atrix
Motorola Droid Pro
CLIQ 2

Some Samsung Galaxy models (still looking into this)
